request.positivePrompt: Scene: Two children step from a city street into a glowing forest at twilight. Character Adrian: 5-7 year old boy, voluminous tousled golden curls, bright blue eyes, pale warm skin, wearing a casual hoodie over a white crewneck shirt—expressive and empathetic; consistent in all scenes. Character Alexander: 8-10 year old boy, short tousled brown hair, bright green eyes, wearing layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest—energetic and curious. Environment: tall trees with lantern-like glowing sap, light bands across a mossy path, delicate roots forming narrow trails, soft mist. Mood: warm, epic, slightly mysterious. Lighting: warm watercolor glow, dappled with cool shadows. Camera perspective: mid-shot from slightly below eye level to emphasize wonder. Action verbs: stepping, pulling, listening, touching moss. Recurring motifs: light bands and whispering sound. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly. CHARACTERS IN THIS SCENE: Adrian: 5-7 years old, male, warm golden blond short curly voluminous tousled curls hair, bright blue eyes, pale peach skin, wearing casual hoodie over white crewneck shirt, voluminous curly golden hair, large expressive bright blue eyes, rosy round childlike cheeks, small button-shaped nose, gentle small smiling mouth, prominent rounded ears slightly visible, soft pale warm skin, innocent empathetic friendly expression Alexander: 8-10 years old, male, medium brown short straight with slight wave tousled, slightly spiky at crown hair, bright green eyes, light warm peach skin, wearing casual layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest, short tousled brown hair, large bright green eyes, round youthful face, rosy button nose, small smiling mouth, light freckles and blush, slim neck and shoulders, expressive arched eyebrows, soft natural lighting IMPORTANT: Characters listed from youngest to oldest. Maintain size relationships - Adrian (5-7y) must be SMALLER than any older character. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly
